æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶æœº â€‹

1. æŒ‚è½½é˜¶æ®µï¼ˆMountingï¼‰ â€‹

å‚æ•°è§£é‡Š â€‹

class ThemeComponent extends React.Component {
  state = { color: this.props.color };

  static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) {
    if (nextProps.color !== prevState.color) {
      return { color: nextProps.color };
    }
    return null;
  }

  render() {
    return <div style={{ backgroundColor: this.state.color }}>ä¸»é¢˜é¢œè‰²</div>;
  }
}
class ThemeComponent extends React.Component {
  state = { color: this.props.color };

  static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) {
    if (nextProps.color !== prevState.color) {
      return { color: nextProps.color };
    }
    return null;
  }

  render() {
    return <div style={{ backgroundColor: this.state.color }}>ä¸»é¢˜é¢œè‰²</div>;
  }

  1. æ¡ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“ï¼šæ ¹æ®å±æ€§æ§åˆ¶ç»„ä»¶çš„æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚ å‡è®¾ä¸€ä¸ªæƒé™æ§åˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šæ ¹æ®ä¼ å…¥çš„æƒé™çº§åˆ«æ˜¾ç¤ºæˆ–éšè—æŸäº›åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

class PermissionComponent extends React.Component {
  state = { isAdmin: this.props.isAdmin };

  static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) {
    if (nextProps.isAdmin !== prevState.isAdmin) {
      return { isAdmin: nextProps.isAdmin };
    }
    return null;
  }

  render() {
    return this.state.isAdmin ? <AdminFeatures /> : <UserFeatures />;
  }
}
class PermissionComponent extends React.Component {
  state = { isAdmin: this.props.isAdmin };

  static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) {
    if (nextProps.isAdmin !== prevState.isAdmin) {
      return { isAdmin: nextProps.isAdmin };
    }
    return null;
  }

  render() {
    return this.state.isAdmin ? <AdminFeatures /> : <UserFeatures />;
  }
}

5. æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹å’Œæœ€ä½³å®è·µ â€‹
